value.title: CALCULATE in DAX
value.excerpt: Learn many details about the most important DAX function: CALCULATE!

topItems.title: CALCULATE in DAX #01: Filters are tables
topItems.excerpt: Learn why all the CALCULATE filters are tables. How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt CALCULATE function: https://dax.guide/calculate/?aff=yt
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Tk-7gBt9CDE" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

topItems.title: CALCULATE in DAX #02: Add single column filter
topItems.excerpt: By default, a column filter in CALCULATE overwrites the existing filter over the same column. How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt CALCULATE function: https://dax.guide/calculate/?aff=yt
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/cgIi3iFKOvE" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

topItems.title: CALCULATE in DAX #03: Remove single column filters
topItems.excerpt: Use REMOVEFILTERS in CALCULATE to clear the filter from a column. How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt CALCULATE function: https://dax.guide/calculate/?aff=yt
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/VPeo5PF4UTM" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

topItems.title: CALCULATE in DAX #04: Add table filter (and difference with column filters)
topItems.excerpt: Learn the difference between table filters and column filters in CALCULATE. How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt CALCULATE function: https://dax.guide/calculate/?aff=yt

topItems.title: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression
topItems.excerpt: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression Vertipaq is the database and engine that runs on top of Power BI and PowerPivot.   When we import data in Power BI, the Vertipaq database will try with a series of algorithms, to compress the data as much as possible and the best way possible

value.title: Power BI and PowerShell

topItems.title: Get Started with Power BI PowerShell | Install PowerShell Cmdlets for Power BI
topItems.excerpt: In this session, we will talk about how we can get started with the Power BI PowerShell. For any organization, if we wish to perform some admin related tasks easily and in faster manner, PowerShell is the best option. So many operations we can perform very easily and faster.  This is the first introduction

value.title: Embed Power BI
value.excerpt: The ability to embed Power BI into your site or application. This list has videos that are related to the different embedding options for Power BI. This includes Publish to web, the REST APIs and the Power BI Embedded Azure service.

value.title: Power BI Administration

value.title: Administer Power BI, Part 1 - Tenants, governance, collaboration
value.excerpt: As an administrator, how do you manage a Power BI tenant? How do you configure tenant settings, monitor usage, and provision licenses and other organizational resources? This learning path covers typical tasks and tools, such as the Power BI admin portal and Office 365 admin center. You will learn how to establish and provide governance for a Power BI environment and provision Power BI Premium capacity.

topItems.title: Understand the Power BI administrator role
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to administer Power BI to support business decisions backed by data.

topItems.title: Establish a Power BI environment
topItems.excerpt: This module covers topics relating to establishing a Power BI environment within Office 365 containers.

topItems.title: Provide governance in a Power BI environment
topItems.excerpt: Learn the fundamental rules, regulations, and policies of a BI governance approach.

topItems.title: Facilitate collaboration and sharing in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to collaborate and share dashboards and reports with coworkers.

value.title: Administer Power BI, Part 2 - Premium, Power BI embedded, automation
value.excerpt: As an administrator, how do you foster collaboration and share Power BI outputs? How do you monitor and audit usage, build a data access infrastructure, and automate administration? This course will demonstrate how Power BI Premium manages capacity resources. You‚Äôll learn how to establish a data access infrastructure and how to share Power BI reports beyond your Power BI tenant. Finally, you‚Äôll learn how to automate common tasks with Microsoft Power BI Cmdlets for Windows PowerShell and PowerShell core.

topItems.title: Provision Premium capacity in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the differences between Power BI Pro and Power BI Premium, and how Power BI Premium manages capacity resources.

topItems.title: Establish a data access infrastructure in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to establish a data access infrastructure for accessing all your data within Power BI.

topItems.title: Broaden the reach of Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Learn the various ways to share Power BI reports beyond your Power BI tenant.

topItems.title: Automate Power BI administration
topItems.excerpt: Common manual tasks can be automated with Microsoft Power BI Cmdlets for Windows PowerShell and PowerShell core.

value.title: Administer Power BI, Part 2 - Tenants, governance, collaboration
value.excerpt: Power BI administrators manage every aspect of their tenant. This learning path covers advanced administrative tasks, such as fostering collaboration and sharing data. You will earn how to monitor and audit usage, build a data access infrastructure, broaden the reach of Power BI, and automate administration with APIs and PowerShell cmdlets.

topItems.title: Provision Premium capacity in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the differences between Power BI Pro and Power BI Premium, and how Power BI Premium manages capacity resources.

topItems.title: Establish a data access infrastructure in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to establish a data access infrastructure for accessing all your data within Power BI.

topItems.title: Broaden the reach of Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Learn the various ways to share Power BI reports beyond your Power BI tenant.

topItems.title: Automate Power BI administration
topItems.excerpt: Common manual tasks can be automated with Microsoft Power BI Cmdlets for Windows PowerShell and PowerShell core.

value.title: Data analysis in Power BI
value.excerpt: Report authors can use additional features to enhance their reports for analytical insights in their data with features like Q&A and exporting. In this module, you will closely examine your data and Power BI reports and then extract value with deeper analysis. Additionally, you will learn how to sort data and how to present the report in a cohesive manner. You will learn how to get a statistical summary for your data and export data from Power BI. You will also apply and perform advanced analytics on the report for deeper and more meaningful data insights.

topItems.title: Perform analytics in Power BI¬†
topItems.excerpt: You will learn how to use Power BI to perform data analytical functions, how to identify outliers in your data, how to group data together, and how to bin data for analysis. You will also learn how to perform time series analysis. Finally, you will work with advanced analytic features of Power BI, such as Quick Insights, AI Insights, and the Analyze feature.

topItems.title: Work with AI visuals in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: This module describes the AI capabilities of Power BI.

value.title: Design and build tabular models
value.excerpt: Design and build tabular models

topItems.title: Create Power BI model relationships
topItems.excerpt: Power BI model relationships form the basis of a tabular model. Define Power BI model relationships, set up relationships, recognize DAX relationship functions, and describe relationship evaluation.

topItems.title: Use DAX time intelligence functions in Power BI Desktop models
topItems.excerpt: By the end of this module, you'll learn the meaning of time intelligence and how to add time intelligence DAX calculations to your model. These calculations will include year-to-date (YTD), year-over-year (YoY) growth, and others.

topItems.title: Create calculation groups
topItems.excerpt: Power BI, calculation groups, enterprise data analyst

topItems.title: Enforce Power BI model security
topItems.excerpt: Enforce model security in Power BI using row-level security and object-level security.

value.title: Embed Power BI analytics
value.excerpt: This learning path teaches you how to embed Power BI content in apps, develop programmatic solutions using the Power BI REST API and the Power BI Client APIs, enforce row-level security (RLS) for embedded content, automate common Power BI setup tasks, configure a development environment, and determine appropriate licensing.

topItems.title: Introduction to Power BI embedded analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how developers can programmatically embed analytics in their apps, and about no-code embedding options for simpler requirements.

topItems.title: Select a Power BI embedded analytics product
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to select a Power BI embedded analytics product.

topItems.title: Set up permissions to embed Power BI content
topItems.excerpt: Learn which settings and permissions to use for internal and external users of your app with embedded Power BI content.

topItems.title: Embed Power BI content
topItems.excerpt: Learn about embedding Power BI content.

value.title: Gain insights into your data through intelligent tools in Power BI
value.excerpt: Gain insights into your data through intelligent tools in Power BI

topItems.title: Deliver decision-making insights with Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Deliver decision-making insights with Power BI

topItems.title: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure
topItems.excerpt: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure

topItems.title: Advance Power BI Premium for the enterprise analytics market and beyond
topItems.excerpt: Advance Power BI Premium for the enterprise analytics market and beyond

topItems.title: Gain insights into usage and performance of your Power BI reports to increase adoption and reduce costs

topItems.title: Facilitate collaboration and sharing in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to collaborate and share dashboards and reports with coworkers.

topItems.title: Monitor and audit usage
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use activity logs and auditing with Power BI to monitor and inspect user activity in a Power BI environment.
